parameter.name: cov_type
parameter.desc: Cover type designation for HRU
parameter.help: Vegetation cover type for each HRU (0=bare soil; 1=grasses; 2=shrubs; 3=trees; 4=coniferous)

parameter.name: covden_sum
parameter.desc: Summer vegetation cover density for major vegetation type
parameter.help: Summer vegetation cover density for the major vegetation type in each HRU

parameter.name: covden_win
parameter.desc: Winter vegetation cover density for major vegetation type
parameter.help: Winter vegetation cover density for the major vegetation type in each HRU

parameter.name: dprst_frac
parameter.desc: Fraction of each HRU area that has surface depressions
parameter.help: Fraction of each HRU area that has surface depressions

parameter.name: dprst_frac_open
parameter.desc: Fraction of open surface-depression storage area within an HRU that can generate surface runoff as a function of storage volume
parameter.help: Fraction of open surface-depression storage area within an HRU that can generate surface runoff as a function of storage volume

parameter.name: elev_units
parameter.desc: Elevation units flag
parameter.help: Flag to indicate the units of the elevation values (0=feet; 1=meters)

parameter.name: hru_elev
parameter.desc: HRU mean elevation
parameter.help: Mean elevation for each HRU

parameter.name: hru_lat
parameter.desc: HRU latitude
parameter.help: Latitude of each HRU

parameter.name: hru_percent_imperv
parameter.desc: HRU percent impervious
parameter.help: Fraction of each HRU area that is impervious

parameter.name: hru_type
parameter.desc: HRU type
parameter.help: Type of each HRU (0=inactive; 1=land; 2=lake; 3=swale)

parameter.name: lake_hru_id
parameter.desc: Identification number of the lake associated with an HRU
parameter.help: Identification number of the lake associated with an HRU; more than one HRU can be associated with each lake

parameter.name: lake_type
parameter.desc: Type of lake routing method
parameter.help: Type of lake routing method (1=Puls routing; 2=linear routing; 3=flow through; 4=broad crested weir; 5=gate opening; 6=measured flow)

parameter.name: hru_area
parameter.desc: HRU area
parameter.help: Area of each HRU

parameter.name: outlet_sta
parameter.desc: Index of measurement station to use for basin outlet
parameter.help: Index of measured streamflow station corresponding to the basin outlet

parameter.name: print_freq
parameter.desc: Frequency for the output frequency
parameter.help: Flag to select the output frequency; for combinations, add index numbers, e.g., daily plus yearly = 10; yearly plus total = 3 (0=none; 1=run totals; 2=yearly; 4=monthly; 8=daily; or additive combinations)

parameter.name: print_type
parameter.desc: Type of output written to output file
parameter.help: Flag to select the type of results written to the output file (0=measured and simulated flow only; 1=water balance table; 2=detailed output)

parameter.name: cascade_flg
parameter.desc: Flag to indicate cascade type (0=allow many to many; 1=force one to one)
parameter.help: Flag to indicate cascade type (0=allow many to many; 1=force one to one)

parameter.name: cascade_tol
parameter.desc: Cascade area below which a cascade link is ignored
parameter.help: Cascade area below which a cascade link is ignored

parameter.name: circle_switch
parameter.desc: Switch to check for circles
parameter.help: Switch to check for circles (0=no check; 1=check)

parameter.name: gw_down_id
parameter.desc: GWR index of downslope GWR
parameter.help: Index number of the downslope GWR to which the upslope GWR contributes flow

parameter.name: gw_pct_up
parameter.desc: Fraction of GWR area associated with cascade area
parameter.help: Fraction of GWR area used to compute flow contributed to a downslope GWR or stream segment for cascade area

parameter.name: gw_strmseg_down_id
parameter.desc: Stream segment index that cascade area contributes flow
parameter.help: Index number of the stream segment that cascade area contributes flow

parameter.name: gw_up_id
parameter.desc: Index of GWR containing cascade area
parameter.help: Index of GWR containing cascade area

parameter.name: hru_down_id
parameter.desc: HRU index of downslope HRU
parameter.help: Index number of the downslope HRU to which the upslope HRU contributes flow

parameter.name: hru_pct_up
parameter.desc: Fraction of HRU area associated with cascade area
parameter.help: Fraction of HRU area used to compute flow contributed to a downslope HRU or stream segment for cascade area

parameter.name: hru_strmseg_down_id
parameter.desc: Stream segment index that cascade area contributes flow
parameter.help: Index number of the stream segment that cascade area contributes flow

parameter.name: hru_up_id
parameter.desc: Index of HRU containing cascade area
parameter.help: Index of HRU containing cascade area

parameter.name: crad_coef
parameter.desc: Coefficient in cloud cover-solar radiation relationship
parameter.help: Coefficient(B) in Thompson(1976) equation; varies by region, contour map of values in reference

parameter.name: crad_exp
parameter.desc: Exponent in cloud cover-solar radiation relationship
parameter.help: Exponent(P) in Thompson(1976) equation

parameter.name: basin_solsta
parameter.desc: Index of main solar radiation station
parameter.help: Index of solar radiation station used to compute basin radiation values, used when dimension nsol>0

parameter.name: hru_solsta
parameter.desc: Index of solar radiation station associated with each HRU
parameter.help: Index of solar radiation station associated with each HRU

parameter.name: ppt_rad_adj
parameter.desc: Radiation reduced if HRU precipitation above this value
parameter.help: Monthly minimum precipitation, if HRU precipitation exceeds this value, radiation is multiplied by radj_sppt or radj_wppt adjustment factor

parameter.name: rad_conv
parameter.desc: Conversion factor to Langleys for measured solar radiation
parameter.help: Conversion factor to Langleys for measured solar radiation

parameter.name: radj_sppt
parameter.desc: Adjustment to solar radiation on precipitation day - summer
parameter.help: Adjustment factor for computed solar radiation for summer day with greater than ppt_rad_adj inches of precipitation for each HRU

parameter.name: radj_wppt
parameter.desc: Adjustment to solar radiation on precipitation day - winter
parameter.help: Adjustment factor for computed solar radiation for winter day with greater than ppt_rad_adj inches of precipitation for each HRU

parameter.name: radmax
parameter.desc: Maximum fraction of potential solar radiation
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) maximum fraction of the potential solar radiation that may reach the ground due to haze, dust, smog, and so forth, for each HRU

parameter.name: ccov_intcp
parameter.desc: Intercept in temperature cloud cover relationship
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) intercept in cloud-cover relationship

parameter.name: ccov_slope
parameter.desc: Slope in temperature cloud cover relationship
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) coefficient in cloud-cover relationship

parameter.name: potet_cbh_adj
parameter.desc: Potential ET adjustment factor, by month for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) adjustment factor to potential evapotranspiration specified in CBH Files for each HRU

parameter.name: rain_cbh_adj
parameter.desc: Rain adjustment factor, by month for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) adjustment factor to measured precipitation determined to be rain on each HRU to account for differences in elevation, and so forth

parameter.name: snow_cbh_adj
parameter.desc: Snow adjustment factor, by month for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) adjustment factor to measured precipitation determined to be snow on each HRU to account for differences in elevation, and so forth

parameter.name: tmax_cbh_adj
parameter.desc: Monthly maximum temperature adjustment factor for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) adjustment factor to maximum air temperature for each HRU, estimated on the basis of slope and aspect

parameter.name: tmin_cbh_adj
parameter.desc: Monthly minimum temperature adjustment factor for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) adjustment factor to minimum air temperature for each HRU, estimated on the basis of slope and aspect

parameter.name: humidity_percent
parameter.desc: Monthy humidity for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthy humidity for each HRU

parameter.name: dday_intcp
parameter.desc: Intercept in temperature degree-day relationship
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) intercept in degree-day equation for each HRU

parameter.name: dday_slope
parameter.desc: Slope in temperature degree-day relationship
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) slope in degree-day equation for each HRU

parameter.name: radadj_intcp
parameter.desc: Intercept in air temperature range adjustment to degree-day equation
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) intercept in air temperature range adjustment to degree-day equation for each HRU

parameter.name: radadj_slope
parameter.desc: Slope in air temperature range adjustment to degree-day equation
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) slope in air temperature range adjustment to degree-day equation for each HRU

parameter.name: tmax_index
parameter.desc: Monthly index temperature
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) index temperature used to determine precipitation adjustments to solar radiation for each HRU

parameter.name: frost_temp
parameter.desc: Temperature of killing frost
parameter.help: Temperature of killing frost

parameter.name: elevlake_init
parameter.desc: Initial lake surface elevation
parameter.help: Initial lake surface elevation for each lake using broad-crested weir or gate opening routing

parameter.name: gw_seep_coef
parameter.desc: Linear coefficient to compute seepage and groundwater discharge to and from associated lake HRUs
parameter.help: Linear coefficient in equation to compute lakebed seepage to the GWR and groundwater discharge to each lake using broad-crested weir routing or gate opening routing

parameter.name: gwflow_coef
parameter.desc: Groundwater routing coefficient
parameter.help: Linear coefficient in the equation to compute groundwater discharge for each GWR

parameter.name: gwsink_coef
parameter.desc: Groundwater sink coefficient
parameter.help: Linear coefficient in the equation to compute outflow to the groundwater sink for each GWR

parameter.name: gwstor_init
parameter.desc: Initial storage in each GWR
parameter.help: Storage in each GWR at the beginning of a simulation

parameter.name: gwstor_min
parameter.desc: Minimum storage in each GWR
parameter.help: Minimum storage in each GWR to ensure storage is greater than specified value to account for inflow from deep aquifers or injection wells with the water source outside the basin

parameter.name: lake_seep_elev
parameter.desc: Elevation over which lakebed seepage to the GWR occurs
parameter.help: Elevation over which lakebed seepage to the GWR occurs for lake HRUs using broad-crested weir routing or gate opening routing

parameter.name: psta_elev
parameter.desc: Precipitation station elevation
parameter.help: Elevation of each precipitation measurement station

parameter.name: epan_coef
parameter.desc: Evaporation pan coefficient
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) evaporation pan coefficient for each HRU

parameter.name: irr_type
parameter.desc: Method of application of water for each application
parameter.help: Method of application of water for each application time-series (0=sprinkler (interception applies); 1=furrow/drip (no intercept); 2=ignore)

parameter.name: snow_intcp
parameter.desc: Snow interception storage capacity
parameter.help: Snow interception storage capacity for the major vegetation type in each HRU

parameter.name: srain_intcp
parameter.desc: Summer rain interception storage capacity
parameter.help: Summer rain interception storage capacity for the major vegetation type in each HRU

parameter.name: wrain_intcp
parameter.desc: Winter rain interception storage capacity
parameter.help: Winter rain interception storage capacity for the major vegetation type in each HRU

parameter.name: gvr_cell_id
parameter.desc: Corresponding grid cell id associated with each GVR
parameter.help: Index of the grid cell associated with each gravity reservoir

parameter.name: gvr_cell_pct
parameter.desc: Proportion of the grid cell associated with each GVR
parameter.help: Proportion of the grid cell area associated with each gravity reservoir

parameter.name: mapvars_freq
parameter.desc: Mapped results frequency
parameter.help: Flag to specify the output frequency (0=none; 1=monthly; 2=yearly; 3=total; 4=monthly and yearly; 5=monthly, yearly, and total; 6=weekly; 7=daily)

parameter.name: mapvars_units
parameter.desc: Flag to specify the output units of mapped results
parameter.help: Flag to specify the output units of mapped results (0=units of the variable; 1=inches to feet; 2=inches to centimeters; 3=inches to meters; as states or fluxes)

parameter.name: ncol
parameter.desc: Number of columns for each row of the mapped results
parameter.help: Number of columns for each row of the mapped results

parameter.name: segment_flow_init
parameter.desc: Initial flow in each stream segment
parameter.help: Initial flow in each stream segment

parameter.name: elev_outflow
parameter.desc: Elevation of the main outflow point
parameter.help: Elevation of the main outflow point for each lake using broad-crested weir routing

parameter.name: lake_coef
parameter.desc: Linear lake routing coefficient
parameter.help: Coefficient in equation to route storage to streamflow for each lake using linear routing

parameter.name: lake_din1
parameter.desc: Initial inflow to each lake
parameter.help: Initial inflow to each lake using Puls or linear storage routing

parameter.name: lake_init
parameter.desc: Initial storage in each lake
parameter.help: Initial storage in each lake using Puls or linear storage routing

parameter.name: lake_out2
parameter.desc: Switch to specify a second outlet from a lake
parameter.help: Switch to specify a second outlet from each lake using gate opening routing (0=no; 1=yes)

parameter.name: lake_out2_a
parameter.desc: Outflow coefficient A for each lake with second outlet
parameter.help: Coefficient A in outflow equation for each lake with a second outlet using gate opening routing

parameter.name: lake_out2_b
parameter.desc: Outflow coefficient A for each lake with second outlet
parameter.help: Coefficient B in outflow equation for each lake with a second outlet using gate opening routing

parameter.name: lake_qro
parameter.desc: Initial daily mean outflow from each lake
parameter.help: Initial daily mean outflow from each lake

parameter.name: lake_segment_id
parameter.desc: Index of lake associated with a segment
parameter.help: Index of lake associated with a segment

parameter.name: lake_vol_init
parameter.desc: Initial lake volume
parameter.help: Initial lake volume for each lake using broad-crested weir or gate opening routing

parameter.name: nsos
parameter.desc: Number of storage/outflow values in table for Puls routing
parameter.help: Number of storage/outflow values in table for each lake using Puls routing

parameter.name: o2
parameter.desc: Outflow values in outflow/storage tables for Puls routing
parameter.help: Outflow values in outflow/storage tables for each lake using Puls routing

parameter.name: obsout_lake
parameter.desc: Index of streamflow measurement station that specifies outflow from a lake
parameter.help: Index of streamflow measurement station that specifies outflow from each lake using measured flow replacement

parameter.name: rate_table
parameter.desc: Rating table 1 with stage (rows) and gate opening (cols)
parameter.help: Rating table with stage (rows) and gate opening (cols) for rating table 1 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>0

parameter.name: rate_table2
parameter.desc: Rating table 2 with stage (rows) and gate opening (cols)
parameter.help: Rating table with stage (rows) and gate opening (cols) for rating table 2 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>1

parameter.name: rate_table3
parameter.desc: Rating table 3 with stage (rows) and gate opening (cols)
parameter.help: Rating table with stage (rows) and gate opening (cols) for rating table 3 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>2

parameter.name: rate_table4
parameter.desc: Rating table 4 with stage (rows) and gate opening (cols)
parameter.help: Rating table with stage (rows) and gate opening (cols) for rating table 4 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>3

parameter.name: ratetbl_lake
parameter.desc: Index of lake associated with each rating table
parameter.help: Index of lake associated with each rating table for each lake using gate opening routing

parameter.name: s2
parameter.desc: Storage values in outflow/storage tables for Puls routing
parameter.help: Storage values in outflow/storage table for each lake using Puls routing

parameter.name: tbl_gate
parameter.desc: Gate openings for each column of rating table 1
parameter.help: Gate openings for each column for rating table 1 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>0

parameter.name: tbl_gate2
parameter.desc: Gate openings for each column of rating table 2
parameter.help: Gate openings for each column for rating table 2 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>1

parameter.name: tbl_gate3
parameter.desc: Gate openings for each column of rating table 3
parameter.help: Gate openings for each column for rating table 3 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>2

parameter.name: tbl_gate4
parameter.desc: Gate openings for each column of rating table 4
parameter.help: Gate openings for each column for rating table 4 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>3

parameter.name: tbl_stage
parameter.desc: Stage values for each row of rating table 1
parameter.help: Stage values for each row for rating table 1 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>0

parameter.name: tbl_stage2
parameter.desc: Stage values for each row of rating table 2
parameter.help: Stage values for each row for rating table 2 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>1

parameter.name: tbl_stage3
parameter.desc: Stage values for each row of rating table 3
parameter.help: Stage values for each row for rating table 3 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>2

parameter.name: tbl_stage4
parameter.desc: Stage values for each row of rating table 4
parameter.help: Stage values for each row for rating table 4 for lakes using gate opening routing and nratetbl>3

parameter.name: weir_coef
parameter.desc: Broad-crested weir coefficent
parameter.help: Coefficient for lakes using broad-crested weir routing

parameter.name: weir_len
parameter.desc: Broad-crested weir length
parameter.help: Weir length for lakes using broad-crested weir routing

parameter.name: rain_code
parameter.desc: Flag indicating rule for precipitation station use
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) flag indicating rule for precipitation measurement station use (1=only precipitation if the regression stations have precipitation; 2=only precipitation if any station in the basin has precipitation; 3=precipitation if xyz says so; 4=only precipitation if rain_day variable is set to 1; 5=only precipitation if psta_freq_nuse stations have precipitation)

parameter.name: runoff_units
parameter.desc: Measured streamflow units
parameter.help: Measured streamflow units (0=cfs; 1=cms)

parameter.name: hamon_coef
parameter.desc: Monthly air temperature coefficient - Hamon
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) air temperature coefficient used in Hamon potential ET computations for each HRU

parameter.name: hs_krs
parameter.desc: Potential ET adjustment factor - Hargreaves-Samani
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) adjustment factor used in Hargreaves-Samani potential ET computations for each HRU

parameter.name: jh_coef
parameter.desc: Monthly air temperature coefficient for each HRU - Jensen-Haise
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) air temperature coefficient used in Jensen-Haise potential ET computations for each HRU

parameter.name: jh_coef_hru
parameter.desc: HRU air temperature coefficient - Jensen-Haise
parameter.help: Air temperature coefficient used in Jensen-Haise potential ET computations for each HRU

parameter.name: hru_pansta
parameter.desc: Index of pan evaporation station for each HRU
parameter.help: Index of pan evaporation station used to compute HRU potential ET

parameter.name: crop_coef
parameter.desc: Crop coefficient for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) crop coefficient for each HRU

parameter.name: pm_d_coef
parameter.desc: Penman-Monteith coefficient
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) Penman-Monteith potential ET D wind-speed coefficient for each HRU

parameter.name: pm_n_coef
parameter.desc: Penman-Monteith coefficient
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) Penman-Monteith potential ET N temperauture coefficient for each HRU

parameter.name: hru_humidity_sta
parameter.desc: Index of humidity measurement station for each HRU
parameter.help: Index of humidity measurement station for each HRU

parameter.name: hru_windspeed_sta
parameter.desc: Index of wind speed measurement station for each HRU
parameter.help: Index of wind speed measurement station for each HRU

parameter.name: pt_alpha
parameter.desc: Potential ET adjustment factor - Priestly-Taylor
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) adjustment factor used in Priestly-Taylor potential ET computations for each HRU

parameter.name: adjmix_rain
parameter.desc: Adjustment factor for rain in a rain/snow mix
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) factor to adjust rain proportion in a mixed rain/snow event

parameter.name: precip_units
parameter.desc: Units for measured precipitation
parameter.help: Units for measured precipitation (0=inches; 1=mm)

parameter.name: tmax_allrain_offset
parameter.desc: Precipitation is rain if HRU max temperature >= tmax_allsnow + this value
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) maximum air temperature when precipitation is assumed to be rain; if HRU air temperature is greater than or equal to tmax_allsnow plus this value, precipitation is rain

parameter.name: tmax_allsnow
parameter.desc: Maximum temperature when precipitation is all snow
parameter.help: Maximum air temperature when precipitation is assumed to be snow; if HRU air temperature is less than or equal to this value, precipitation is snow

parameter.name: hru_plaps
parameter.desc: Index of precipitation station to lapse against hru_psta
parameter.help: Index of the lapse precipitation measurement station used for lapse rate calculations for each HRU

parameter.name: hru_psta
parameter.desc: Index of base precipitation station for HRU
parameter.help: Index of the base precipitation station used for lapse rate calculations for each HRU

parameter.name: padj_rn
parameter.desc: Rain adjustment factor, by month for each precipitation station
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) factor to adjust precipitation lapse rate computed between station hru_psta and station hru_plaps; positive factors are mutiplied times the lapse rate and negative factors are made positive and substituted for the computed lapse rate

parameter.name: padj_sn
parameter.desc: Snow adjustment factor, by month for each precipitation station
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) factor to adjust precipitation lapse rate computed between station hru_psta and station hru_plaps; positive factors are mutiplied times the lapse rate and negative factors are made positive and substituted for the computed lapse rate

parameter.name: pmn_mo
parameter.desc: Mean monthly precipitation for each lapse precipitation station
parameter.help: Mean monthly (January to December) precipitation for each lapse precipitation measurement station

parameter.name: rain_adj
parameter.desc: Monthly rain adjustment factor for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) factor to adjust measured precipitation on each HRU to account for differences in elevation, and so forth

parameter.name: snow_adj
parameter.desc: Monthly snow adjustment factor for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) factor to adjust measured precipitation on each HRU to account for differences in elevation, and so forth

parameter.name: max_psta
parameter.desc: Maximum number of precipitation stations to distribute to an HRU
parameter.help: Maximum number of precipitation measurement stations to distribute to an HRU

parameter.name: maxday_prec
parameter.desc: Maximum daily precipitation for any weather site
parameter.help: Maximum measured precipitation value above which precipitation is assumed to be in error

parameter.name: psta_mon
parameter.desc: Monthly precipitation for each of the nrain precipitation measurement stations
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) factor to precipitation at each measured station to adjust precipitation distributed to each HRU to account for differences in elevation, and so forth

parameter.name: psta_xlong
parameter.desc: Precipitation station longitude, State Plane
parameter.help: Longitude of each precipitation measurement station, State Plane Coordinate System

parameter.name: psta_ylat
parameter.desc: Precipitation station latitude, State Plane
parameter.help: Latitude of each precipitation measurement station, State Plane Coordinate System

parameter.name: rain_mon
parameter.desc: Rain adjustment factor, by month for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) factor to rain on each HRU to adjust precipitation distributed to each HRU to account for differences in elevation, and so forth

parameter.name: snow_mon
parameter.desc: Rain adjustment factor, by month for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) factor to snow on each HRU to adjust precipitation distributed to each HRU to account for differences in elevation, and so forth

parameter.name: dist_max
parameter.desc: Maximum distance from HRU to include a climate station
parameter.help: Maximum distance from an HRU to a measurement station for use in calcuations

parameter.name: hru_xlong
parameter.desc: HRU longitude of centroid, State Plane
parameter.help: Longitude of each HRU for the centroid, State Plane Coordinate System

parameter.name: hru_ylat
parameter.desc: HRU latitude of centroid, State Plane
parameter.help: Latitude of each HRU for the centroid, State Plane Coordinate System

parameter.name: K_coef
parameter.desc: Muskingum storage coefficient
parameter.help: Travel time of flood wave from one segment to the next downstream segment, called the Muskingum storage coefficient; enter 1.0 for reservoirs, diversions, and segment(s) flowing out of the basin

parameter.name: hru_segment
parameter.desc: Segment index for HRU lateral inflows
parameter.help: Segment index to which an HRU contributes lateral flows (surface runoff, interflow, and groundwater discharge)

parameter.name: hru_segment_nhm
parameter.desc: NHM segment index for HRU lateral inflows
parameter.help: NHM segment index to which an HRU contributes lateral flows (surface runoff, interflow, and groundwater discharge)

parameter.name: obsin_segment
parameter.desc: Index of measured streamflow station that replaces inflow to a segment
parameter.help: Index of measured streamflow station that replaces inflow to a segment

parameter.name: obsout_segment
parameter.desc: Index of measured streamflow station that replaces outflow from a segment
parameter.help: Index of measured streamflow station that replaces outflow from a segment

parameter.name: segment_type
parameter.desc: Segment type
parameter.help: Segment type (0=segment; 1=headwater; 2=lake; 3=replace inflow; 4=inbound to NHM; 5=outbound from NHM; 6=inbound to region; 7=outbound from region; 8=drains to ocean; 9=sink; 10=inbound from Great Lakes; 11=outbound to Great Lakes)

parameter.name: tosegment
parameter.desc: The index of the downstream segment
parameter.help: Index of downstream segment to which the segment streamflow flows, for segments that do not flow to another segment enter 0

parameter.name: tosegment_nhm
parameter.desc: The NHM index of the downstream segment
parameter.help: NHM index of downstream segment to which the segment streamflow flows, for segments that do not flow to another segment enter 0

parameter.name: x_coef
parameter.desc: Routing weighting factor
parameter.help: The amount of attenuation of the flow wave, called the Muskingum routing weighting factor; enter 0.0 for reservoirs, diversions, and segment(s) flowing out of the basin

parameter.name: hru_lon
parameter.desc: HRU longitude
parameter.help: Longitude of each HRU

parameter.name: hru_x
parameter.desc: X for each HRU (albers)
parameter.help: Longitude (X) for each HRU in albers projection

parameter.name: hru_y
parameter.desc: Y for each HRU (albers)
parameter.help: Latitude (Y) for each HRU in albers projection

parameter.name: nhm_id
parameter.desc: National Hydrologic Model HRU ID
parameter.help: National Hydrologic Model HRU ID

parameter.name: parent_gw
parameter.desc: Lumen index in parent model for each GWR
parameter.help: Lumen index in parent model for each GWR

parameter.name: parent_hru
parameter.desc: Lumen index in parent model for each HRU
parameter.help: Lumen index in parent model for each HRU

parameter.name: parent_segment
parameter.desc: Lumen index in parent model for each segment
parameter.help: Lumen index in parent model for each segment

parameter.name: parent_ssr
parameter.desc: Lumen index in parent model for each SSR
parameter.help: Lumen index in parent model for each SSR

parameter.name: poi_type
parameter.desc: Type code for each POI gage
parameter.help: Type code for each POI gage

parameter.name: tosegment_nhm
parameter.desc: National Hydrologic Model downstream segment ID
parameter.help: National Model Hydrologic downstream segment ID

parameter.name: nhm_seg
parameter.desc: National Hydrologic Model segment ID
parameter.help: National Hydrologic Model segment ID

parameter.name: parent_poigages
parameter.desc: Lumen index in parent model for each POI gage
parameter.help: Lumen index in parent model for each POI gage

parameter.name: poi_gage_id
parameter.desc: POI Gage ID
parameter.help: USGS stream gage for each POI gage

parameter.name: poi_gage_segment
parameter.desc: Segment index for each POI gage
parameter.help: Segment index for each POI gage

parameter.name: albset_rna
parameter.desc: Albedo reset - rain, accumulation stage
parameter.help: Fraction of rain in a mixed precipitation event above which the snow albedo is not reset; applied during the snowpack accumulation stage

parameter.name: albset_rnm
parameter.desc: Albedo reset - rain, melt stage
parameter.help: Fraction of rain in a mixed precipitation event above which the snow albedo is not reset; applied during the snowpack melt stage

parameter.name: albset_sna
parameter.desc: Albedo reset - snow, accumulation stage
parameter.help: Minimum snowfall, in water equivalent, needed to reset snow albedo during the snowpack accumulation stage

parameter.name: albset_snm
parameter.desc: Albedo reset - snow, melt stage
parameter.help: Minimum snowfall, in water equivalent, needed to reset snow albedo during the snowpack melt stage

parameter.name: cecn_coef
parameter.desc: Monthly convection condensation energy coefficient for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) convection condensation energy coefficient for each HRU

parameter.name: den_init
parameter.desc: Initial density of new-fallen snow
parameter.help: Initial density of new-fallen snow

parameter.name: den_max
parameter.desc: Average maximum snowpack density
parameter.help: Average maximum snowpack density

parameter.name: emis_noppt
parameter.desc: Emissivity of air on days without precipitation for each HRU
parameter.help: Average emissivity of air on days without precipitation for each HRU

parameter.name: freeh2o_cap
parameter.desc: Free-water holding capacity of snowpack for each HRU
parameter.help: Free-water holding capacity of snowpack for each HRU, expressed as a decimal fraction of the frozen water content of the snowpack (pk_ice)

parameter.name: hru_deplcrv
parameter.desc: Index number for snowpack areal depletion curve
parameter.help: Index number for the snowpack areal depletion curve associated with each HRU

parameter.name: nhm_deplcrv
parameter.desc: NHM index number for snowpack areal depletion curve
parameter.help: NHM index number for the snowpack areal depletion curve associated with each HRU

parameter.name: melt_force
parameter.desc: Julian date to force snowpack to spring snowmelt stage for each HRU
parameter.help: Julian date to force snowpack to spring snowmelt stage for each HRU; varies with region depending on length of time that permanent snowpack exists

parameter.name: melt_look
parameter.desc: Julian date to start looking for spring snowmelt for each HRU
parameter.help: Julian date to start looking for spring snowmelt stage for each HRU; varies with region depending on length of time that permanent snowpack exists

parameter.name: potet_sublim
parameter.desc: Fraction of potential ET that is sublimated from snow for each HRU
parameter.help: Fraction of potential ET that is sublimated from snow in the canopy and snowpack for each HRU

parameter.name: rad_trncf
parameter.desc: Solar radiation transmission coefficient
parameter.help: Transmission coefficient for short-wave radiation through the winter vegetation canopy

parameter.name: settle_const
parameter.desc: Snowpack settlement time constant
parameter.help: Snowpack settlement time constant

parameter.name: snarea_curve
parameter.desc: Snow area depletion curve values
parameter.help: Snow area depletion curve values, 11 values for each curve (0.0 to 1.0 in 0.1 increments)

parameter.name: snarea_thresh
parameter.desc: Maximum threshold water equivalent for snow depletion
parameter.help: Maximum threshold snowpack water equivalent below which the snow-covered-area curve is applied

parameter.name: snowpack_init
parameter.desc: Initial snowpack water equivalent in each HRU
parameter.help: Storage of snowpack in each HRU at the beginning of a simulation

parameter.name: tstorm_mo
parameter.desc: Set to 1 if thunderstorms prevalent during month for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly flag (January to December) for prevalent storm type for each HRU (0=frontal storms; 1=convective storms)

parameter.name: fastcoef_lin
parameter.desc: Linear preferential-flow routing coefficient
parameter.help: Linear coefficient in equation to route preferential-flow storage downslope for each HRU

parameter.name: fastcoef_sq
parameter.desc: Non-linear preferential-flow routing coefficient
parameter.help: Non-linear coefficient in equation used to route preferential-flow storage downslope for each HRU

parameter.name: lake_evap_adj
parameter.desc: Monthly potet factor to adjust potet on lakes
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) adjustment factor for potential ET for each lake

parameter.name: pref_flow_den
parameter.desc: Fraction of the soil zone in which preferential flow occurs for each HRU
parameter.help: Fraction of the soil zone in which preferential flow occurs for each HRU

parameter.name: slowcoef_lin
parameter.desc: Linear gravity-flow reservoir routing coefficient
parameter.help: Linear coefficient in equation to route gravity-reservoir storage downslope for each HRU

parameter.name: slowcoef_sq
parameter.desc: Non-linear gravity-flow reservoir routing coefficient
parameter.help: Non-linear coefficient in equation to route gravity-reservoir storage downslope for each HRU

parameter.name: soil2gw_max
parameter.desc: Maximum value for capillary reservoir excess to GWR
parameter.help: Maximum amount of the capillary reservoir excess that is routed directly to the GWR for each HRU

parameter.name: soil_type
parameter.desc: HRU soil type
parameter.help: Soil type of each HRU (1=sand; 2=loam; 3=clay)

parameter.name: ssr2gw_exp
parameter.desc: Coefficient to route water from subsurface to groundwater
parameter.help: Non-linear coefficient in equation used to route water from the gravity reservoir to the GWR for each HRU

parameter.name: ssr2gw_rate
parameter.desc: Coefficient to route water from gravity reservoir to GWR
parameter.help: Linear coefficient in equation used to route water from the gravity reservoir to the GWR for each HRU

parameter.name: sat_threshold
parameter.desc: Soil saturation threshold, above field-capacity threshold
parameter.help: Water holding capacity of the gravity and preferential-flow reservoirs; difference between field capacity and total soil saturation for each HRU

parameter.name: soil_moist_init_frac
parameter.desc: Initial fraction available water in the capillary reservoir
parameter.help: Initial fraction of available water in the capillary reservoir (fraction of soil_moist_max for each HRU

parameter.name: soil_moist_max
parameter.desc: Maximum value of water for soil zone
parameter.help: Maximum available water holding capacity of capillary reservoir from land surface to rooting depth of the major vegetation type of each HRU

parameter.name: soil_rechr_init_frac
parameter.desc: Initial fraction of available water in the soil recharge zone within the capillary reservoir
parameter.help: Initial fraction of available water in the capillary reservoir where losses occur as both evaporation and transpiration (upper zone of capillary reservoir) for each HRU

parameter.name: soil_rechr_max_frac
parameter.desc: Fraction of capillary reservoir where losses occur as both evaporation and transpiration (soil recharge zone)
parameter.help: Fraction of the capillary reservoir water-holding capacity (soil_moist_max) where losses occur as both evaporation and transpiration (upper zone of capillary reservoir) for each HRU

parameter.name: ssstor_init_frac
parameter.desc: Initial fraction of available water in the gravity plus preferential-flow reservoirs
parameter.help: Initial fraction of available water in the gravity plus preferential-flow reservoirs (fraction of sat_threshold) for each HRU

parameter.name: gvr_hru_id
parameter.desc: Corresponding HRU id of each GVR
parameter.help: Index of the HRU associated with each gravity reservoir

parameter.name: hru_aspect
parameter.desc: HRU aspect
parameter.help: Aspect of each HRU

parameter.name: hru_slope
parameter.desc: HRU slope
parameter.help: Slope of each HRU, specified as change in vertical length divided by change in horizontal length

parameter.name: carea_max
parameter.desc: Maximum contributing area
parameter.help: Maximum possible area contributing to surface runoff expressed as a portion of the HRU area

parameter.name: carea_min
parameter.desc: Minimum contributing area
parameter.help: Minimum possible area contributing to surface runoff expressed as a portion of the area for each HRU

parameter.name: dprst_depth_avg
parameter.desc: Average depth of surface depressions at maximum storage capacity
parameter.help: Average depth of surface depressions at maximum storage capacity

parameter.name: dprst_et_coef
parameter.desc: Fraction of unsatisfied potential evapotranspiration to apply to surface-depression storage
parameter.help: Fraction of unsatisfied potential evapotranspiration to apply to surface-depression storage

parameter.name: dprst_flow_coef
parameter.desc: Coefficient in linear flow routing equation for open surface depressions
parameter.help: Coefficient in linear flow routing equation for open surface depressions for each HRU

parameter.name: dprst_frac_init
parameter.desc: Fraction of maximum storage that contains water at the start of a simulation
parameter.help: Fraction of maximum surface-depression storage that contains water at the start of a simulation

parameter.name: dprst_seep_rate_clos
parameter.desc: Coefficient used in linear seepage flow equation for closed surface depressions
parameter.help: Coefficient used in linear seepage flow equation for closed surface depressions for each HRU

parameter.name: dprst_seep_rate_open
parameter.desc: Coefficient used in linear seepage flow equation for open surface depressions
parameter.help: Coefficient used in linear seepage flow equation for open surface depressions for each HRU

parameter.name: op_flow_thres
parameter.desc: Fraction of open depression storage above which surface runoff occurs for each timestep
parameter.help: Fraction of open depression storage above which surface runoff occurs; any water above maximum open storage capacity spills as surface runoff

parameter.name: smidx_coef
parameter.desc: Coefficient in contributing area computations
parameter.help: Coefficient in non-linear contributing area algorithm for each HRU

parameter.name: smidx_exp
parameter.desc: Exponent in contributing area computations
parameter.help: Exponent in non-linear contributing area algorithm for each HRU

parameter.name: sro_to_dprst_imperv
parameter.desc: Fraction of impervious surface runoff that flows into surface-depression storage
parameter.help: Fraction of impervious surface runoff that flows into surface-depression storage; the remainder flows to a stream network for each HRU

parameter.name: sro_to_dprst_perv
parameter.desc: Fraction of pervious surface runoff that flows into surface-depression storage
parameter.help: Fraction of pervious surface runoff that flows into surface-depression storage; the remainder flows to a stream network for each HRU

parameter.name: va_clos_exp
parameter.desc: Coefficient in the exponential equation to compute current surface area of closed surface-depression storage
parameter.help: Coefficient in the exponential equation relating maximum surface area to the fraction that closed depressions are full to compute current surface area for each HRU; 0.001 is an approximate rectangle; 1.0 is a triangle

parameter.name: va_open_exp
parameter.desc: Coefficient in the exponential equation to compute current surface area of open surface-depression storage
parameter.help: Coefficient in the exponential equation relating maximum surface area to the fraction that open depressions are full to compute current surface area for each HRU; 0.001 is an approximate rectangle; 1.0 is a triangle

parameter.name: imperv_stor_max
parameter.desc: HRU maximum impervious area retention storage
parameter.help: Maximum impervious area retention storage for each HRU

parameter.name: snowinfil_max
parameter.desc: Maximum snow infiltration per day
parameter.help: Maximum snow infiltration per day for each HRU

parameter.name: albedo
parameter.desc: Short-wave solar radiation reflected by streams
parameter.help: Short-wave solar radiation reflected by streams

parameter.name: alte
parameter.desc: East bank topographic altitude
parameter.help: East bank topographic altitude of each segment

parameter.name: altw
parameter.desc: West bank topographic altitude
parameter.help: West bank topographic altitude of each segment

parameter.name: azrh
parameter.desc: Azimuth angle of each segment, measured clockwise from north
parameter.help: Azimuth angle of each segment, measured clockwise from north

parameter.name: gw_init
parameter.desc: Initial groundwater temperature
parameter.help: Initial temperature of groundwater entering each segment; recommended value equal to long-term average air temperature

parameter.name: gw_tau
parameter.desc: Average residence time in groundwater flow
parameter.help: Average residence time in subsurface flow

parameter.name: lat_temp_adj
parameter.desc: Correction factor to adjust the bias of the temperature of the lateral inflow
parameter.help: Correction factor to adjust the bias of the temperature of the lateral inflow

parameter.name: maxiter_sntemp
parameter.desc: Maximum number of Newton-Raphson iterations to compute stream temperature
parameter.help: Maximum number of Newton-Raphson iterations to compute stream temperature

parameter.name: melt_temp
parameter.desc: Temperature at which snowmelt enters a stream
parameter.help: Temperature at which snowmelt enters a stream

parameter.name: seg_elev
parameter.desc: Segment elevation at midpoint
parameter.help: Segment elevation at midpoint

parameter.name: seg_lat
parameter.desc: Segment latitude
parameter.help: Latitude of each segment

parameter.name: seg_humidity
parameter.desc: Mean monthly humidity for each segment
parameter.help: Mean monthly humidity for each segment, used when values not input in CBH file

parameter.name: seg_humidity_sta
parameter.desc: Index of humidity measurement station for each stream segment
parameter.help: Index of humidity measurement station for each stream segment

parameter.name: seg_length
parameter.desc: Length of each segment
parameter.help: Length of each segment, bounds based on CONUS

parameter.name: seg_slope
parameter.desc: Surface slope of each segment
parameter.help: Surface slope of each segment

parameter.name: seg_summer_humidity
parameter.desc: Summer humidity for each segment
parameter.help: Summer humidity for each segment, used when values not input in CBH File

parameter.name: seg_winter_humidity
parameter.desc: Winter humidity for each segment
parameter.help: Winter humidity for each segment, used when values not input in CBH File

parameter.name: segshade_sum
parameter.desc: Total shade fraction for summer vegetation
parameter.help: Total shade fraction for summer vegetation; required when stream_temp_flag=1

parameter.name: segshade_win
parameter.desc: Total shade fraction for winter vegetation
parameter.help: Total shade fraction for winter vegetation; required when stream_temp_flag=1

parameter.name: ss_init
parameter.desc: Initial interflow temperature
parameter.help: Initial temperature of interflow entering each segment; recommended value equal to long-term average air temperature

parameter.name: ss_tau
parameter.desc: Average residence time of subsurface interflow
parameter.help: Average residence time of subsurface interflow

parameter.name: vce
parameter.desc: East bank average vegetation crown width
parameter.help: East bank average vegetation crown width for each segment

parameter.name: vcw
parameter.desc: West bank vegetation crown width
parameter.help: West bank average vegetation crown width for each segment

parameter.name: vdemn
parameter.desc: Minimum east bank vegetation density
parameter.help: Minimum east bank vegetation density for each segment

parameter.name: vdemx
parameter.desc: Maximum east bank vegetation density
parameter.help: Maximum east bank vegetation density for each segment

parameter.name: vdwmx
parameter.desc: Maximum west bank vegetation density
parameter.help: Maximum west bank vegetation density for each segment

parameter.name: vhe
parameter.desc: East bank vegetation height
parameter.help: East bank average vegetation height for each segment

parameter.name: vhw
parameter.desc: West bank vegetation height
parameter.help: West bank average vegetation height for each segment

parameter.name: voe
parameter.desc: East bank vegetation offset
parameter.help: East bank vegetation offset for each segment

parameter.name: vow
parameter.desc: West bank vegetation offset
parameter.help: West bank vegetation offset for each segment

parameter.name: width_alpha
parameter.desc: Alpha coefficient in power function for width calculation
parameter.help: Alpha coefficient in power function for width calculation

parameter.name: width_m
parameter.desc: M value in power function for width calculation
parameter.help: M value in power function for width calculation

parameter.name: subbasin_down
parameter.desc: Downstream subbasin for each subbasin
parameter.help: Index number for the downstream subbasin whose inflow is outflow from this subbasin

parameter.name: hru_subbasin
parameter.desc: Index of subbasin assigned to each HRU
parameter.help: Index of subbasin assigned to each HRU

parameter.name: hru_tsta
parameter.desc: Index of base temperature station for HRU
parameter.help: Index of the base temperature station used for lapse rate calculations

parameter.name: basin_tsta
parameter.desc: Index of main temperature station
parameter.help: Index of temperature station used to compute basin temperature values

parameter.name: tsta_elev
parameter.desc: Temperature station elevation
parameter.help: Elevation of each air-temperature-measurement station

parameter.name: temp_units
parameter.desc: Units flag for measured temperature
parameter.help: Flag to indicate the units of measured air-temperature values (0=Fahrenheit; 1=Celsius)

parameter.name: tmax_adj
parameter.desc: HRU maximum temperature adjustment
parameter.help: Adjustment to maximum temperature for each HRU, estimated on the basis of slope and aspect

parameter.name: tmin_adj
parameter.desc: HRU minimum temperature adjustment
parameter.help: Adjustment to minimum temperature for each HRU, estimated on the basis of slope and aspect

parameter.name: hru_tlaps
parameter.desc: Index of lapse temperature station for HRU
parameter.help: Index of the lapse temperature station used for lapse rate calculations

parameter.name: max_missing
parameter.desc: Maximum number of consecutive missing values allowed for any air-temperature-measurement station; 0=unlimited
parameter.help: Maximum number of consecutive missing values allowed for any air-temperature-measurement station; missing value set to last valid value; 0=unlimited

parameter.name: tmax_lapse
parameter.desc: Monthly maximum temperature lapse rate for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) values representing the change in maximum air temperature per 1000 elev_units of elevation change for each HRU

parameter.name: tmin_lapse
parameter.desc: Monthly minimum temperature lapse rate for each HRU
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) values representing the change in minimum air temperture per 1000 elev_units of elevation change for each HRU

parameter.name: lapsemax_max
parameter.desc: Monthly maximum lapse rate for maximum temperature
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) maximum lapse rate to constrain lowest maximum lapse rate on the basis of historical daily air temperatures for all air-temperature measurement stations

parameter.name: lapsemax_min
parameter.desc: Monthly minimum lapse rate for maximum temperature
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) maximum lapse rate to constrain lowest minimum lapse rate on the basis of historical daily air temperatures for all air-temperature measurement stations

parameter.name: lapsemin_max
parameter.desc: Monthly maximum lapse rate for minimum temperature
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) minimum lapse rate to constrain lowest maximum lapse rate on the basis of historical daily air temperatures for all air-temperature measurement stations

parameter.name: lapsemin_min
parameter.desc: Monthly minimum lapse rate for minimum temperature
parameter.help: Monthly (January to December) minimum lapse rate to constrain lowest minimum lapse rate on the basis of historical daily air temperatures for all air-temperature measurement stations

parameter.name: max_tsta
parameter.desc: Maximum number of temperature stations to use for distributing temperature to any HRU
parameter.help: Maximum number of air-temperature measurement stations to use for distributing temperature to any HRU

parameter.name: monmax
parameter.desc: Daily maximum temperature
parameter.help: Monthly maximum air temperature to constrain lowest minimum measured air temperatures for bad values based on historical temperature for all measurement stations

parameter.name: monmin
parameter.desc: Daily minimum temperature
parameter.help: Monthly minimum air temperature to constrain lowest minimum measured air temperatures for bad values based on historical temperature for all measurement stations

parameter.name: tsta_xlong
parameter.desc: Temperature station longitude, State Plane
parameter.help: Longitude of each air-temperature-measurement station, State Plane Coordinate System

parameter.name: tsta_ylat
parameter.desc: Temperature station latitude, State Plane
parameter.help: Latitude of each air-temperature-measurement station, State Plane Coordinate System

parameter.name: fall_frost
parameter.desc: The solar date (number of days after winter solstice) of the first killing frost of the fall
parameter.help: The solar date (number of days after winter solstice) of the first killing frost of the fall

parameter.name: spring_frost
parameter.desc: The solar date (number of days after winter solstice) of the last killing frost of the spring
parameter.help: The solar date (number of days after winter solstice) of the last killing frost of the spring

parameter.name: transp_beg
parameter.desc: Month to begin testing for transpiration
parameter.help: Month to begin summing the maximum air temperature for each HRU; when sum is greater than or equal to transp_tmax, transpiration begins

parameter.name: transp_end
parameter.desc: Month to stop transpiration period
parameter.help: Month to stop transpiration computations; transpiration is computed thru end of previous month

parameter.name: transp_tmax
parameter.desc: Tmax index to determine start of transpiration
parameter.help: Temperature index to determine the specific date of the start of the transpiration period; the maximum air temperature for each HRU is summed starting with the first day of month transp_beg; when the sum exceeds this index, transpiration begins

parameter.name: mann_n
parameter.desc: Manning's roughness coefficient
parameter.help: Manning's roughness coefficient for each segment

parameter.name: seg_depth
parameter.desc: Depth of bankfull water in segment
parameter.help: Width of segment

parameter.name: seg_width
parameter.desc: Segment river width
parameter.help: Segment river width, narrowest observed from Zimmerman 1967, Amazon biggest
